faq.heading: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subheading: Answers to the most common questions about SynVoice.

items.question: How long does it take to deploy a voice agent?
items.answer: Most customers go live in under a week using our pre-built templates and guided onboarding.

items.question: Can SynVoice integrate with our existing CRM?
items.answer: Absolutely. We offer native connectors for Salesforce, HubSpot, and Zendesk, plus a REST API for custom integrations.

items.question: How is usage billed?
items.answer: Plans include a pool of call minutes. If you exceed your quota, additional minutes are billed at a transparent per-minute rate.

items.question: Is our data secure?
items.answer: Yes. We're GDPR compliant, use end-to-end encryption, and offer on-prem deployments for Enterprise clients.

items.question: What languages do you support?
items.answer: SynVoice currently supports 30+ languages, and we're adding more every quarter.

items.question: Can I try SynVoice before committing?
items.answer: Book a demo with our team—we'll set up a proof of concept tailored to your needs, free of charge.
